name: Droopsh
description:
DROOPSH

A game made for the BrackeysGameJam2021.2

- Theme: Let there be chaos - 

THE GAME The longer you play the more chaotic it gets.

Every tile can affect another tile in some way shape or form. Through that mechanic chaos will quickly escelate as combos grow.

The longer the game lasts the more tiles are required to increase the time remaining.

HOW TO PLAY

Use the mouse on the red, green or purple tiles to shoot any other tile and get points. The longer the game lasts the harder it will be to gain extra time and keep going.

Info:

Recommended Screen Resolution: 1920x1080

Controls: Mouse

Recommend clicking F11 (Fullscreen) when running in WEB GL.
